chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Sigma: PropositionalVariables
eqb: Var -> Var -> bool

Goal:
(forall p q : Var, eqb p q = true <-> p = q) -> forall x y : expr Sigma, expr_eqb eqb x y = true <-> x = y

Premises:
Var = fun PropositionalVariables0 : PropositionalVariables => let (Var) := PropositionalVariables0 in Var : PropositionalVariables -> Type Argument PropositionalVariables is implicit and maximally inserted
Inductive expr (Sigma : PropositionalVariables) : Type := andp : expr Sigma -> expr Sigma -> expr Sigma | orp : expr Sigma -> expr Sigma -> expr Sigma | impp : expr Sigma -> expr Sigma -> expr Sigma | sepcon : expr Sigma -> expr Sigma -> expr Sigma | wand : expr Sigma -> expr Sigma -> expr Sigma | emp : expr Sigma | falsep : expr Sigma | varp : Var -> expr Sigma For andp: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For orp: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For impp: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For sepcon: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For wand: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For emp: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For falsep: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted For varp: Argument Sigma is implicit and maximally inserted
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
expr_eqb = fun (Sigma : PropositionalVariables) (eqb : Var -> Var -> bool) => fix expr_eqb (x1 x2 : expr Sigma) {struct x1} : bool := match x1 with | andp y1 z1 => match x2 with | andp y2 z2 => (expr_eqb y1 y2 && expr_eqb z1 z2)%bool | _ => false end | orp y1 z1 => match x2 with | orp y2 z2 => (expr_eqb y1 y2 && expr_eqb z1 z2)%bool | _ => false end | impp y1 z1 => match x2 with | impp y2 z2 => (expr_eqb y1 y2 && expr_eqb z1 z2)%bool | _ => false end | sepcon y1 z1 => match x2 with | sepcon y2 z2 => (expr_eqb y1 y2 && expr_eqb z1 z2)%bool | _ => false end | wand y1
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- nat]
Nat.lcm_unique_alt : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> (forall q : nat, Nat.divide p q <-> Nat.divide n q /\ Nat.divide m q) -> Nat.lcm n m = p
Tauto.eval_f_morph : forall (ex : ?TX -> Prop) (ev ev' : ?TA -> Prop) (f : Tauto.GFormula), (forall a : ?TA, ev a <-> ev' a) -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev f < -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev' f where ?TA : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- Type] ?TX : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- Type] ?AA : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- Type] ?AF : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- Type]
Nat.lcm_unique : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> Nat.divide n p -> Nat.divide m p -> (forall q : nat, Nat.divide n q -> Nat.divide m q -> Nat.divide p q) -> Nat.lcm n m = p
Nat.gcd_unique_alt : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> (forall q : nat, Nat.divide q p <-> Nat.divide q n /\ Nat.divide q m) -> Nat.gcd n m = p
Nat.gcd_unique_alt' : forall n m p : nat, (forall q : nat, Nat.divide q p <-> Nat.divide q n /\ Nat.divide q m) -> Nat.gcd n m = p
Fin.eqb_eq : forall (n : nat) (p q : Fin.t n), Fin.eqb p q = true < -> p = q
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall (o : option ?AF) (g0 : Tauto.GFormula), P g0 -> P (Tauto.I g o g0)) -> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var ->...-> bool |- Type]
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Nat.gcd_unique : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> Nat.divide p n -> Nat.divide p m -> (forall q : nat, Nat.divide q n -> Nat.divide q m -> Nat.divide q p) -> Nat.gcd n m = p
Zle_bool_plus_mono : forall n m p q : Z, (n <=? m)%Z = true -> (p <=? q)%Z = true -> (n + p <=? m + q)%Z = true
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
QArith_base.Qeq_bool_trans : forall x y z : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qeq_bool x y = true -> QArith_base.Qeq_bool y z = true -> QArith_base.Qeq_bool x z = true
N.lcm_unique_alt : forall n m p : N, (0 <= p)%N -> (forall q : N, (p | q)%N <-> (n | q)%N /\ (m | q)%N) -> N.lcm n m = p
Z.gcd_unique_alt : forall n m p : Z, (0 <= p)%Z -> (forall q : Z, (q | p)%Z <-> (q | n)%Z /\ (q | m)%Z) -> Z.gcd n m = p
Z.lcm_unique_alt : forall n m p : Z, (0 <= p)%Z -> (forall q : Z, (p | q)%Z <-> (n | q)%Z /\ (m | q)%Z) -> Z.lcm n m = p
N.gcd_unique_alt : forall n m p : N, (0 <= p)%N -> (forall q : N, (q | p)%N <-> (q | n)%N /\ (q | m)%N) -> N.gcd n m = p
N.gcd_unique_alt' : forall n m p : N, (forall q : N, (q | p)%N <-> (q | n)%N /\ (q | m)%N) -> N.gcd n m = p
expr_rec : forall (Sigma : PropositionalVariables) (P : expr Sigma -> Set), (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (andp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (orp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (impp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (sepcon e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (wand e e0)) -> P emp -> P falsep -> (forall v : Var, P (varp v)) -> forall e : expr Sigma, P e
expr_rect : forall (Sigma : PropositionalVariables) (P : expr Sigma -> Type), (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (andp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (orp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (impp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (sepcon e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (wand e e0)) -> P emp -> P falsep -> (forall v : Var, P (varp v)) -> forall e : expr Sigma, P e
expr_ind : forall (Sigma : PropositionalVariables) (P : expr Sigma -> Prop), (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (andp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (orp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (impp e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (sepcon e e0)) -> (forall e : expr Sigma, P e -> forall e0 : expr Sigma, P e0 -> P (wand e e0)) -> P emp -> P falsep -> (forall v : Var, P (varp v)) -> forall e : expr Sigma, P e
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- Type] ?B : [Sigma : PropositionalVariables eqb : Var -> Var -> bool |- Type]
QArith_base.Qeq = fun p q : QArith_base.Q => (QArith_base.Qnum p * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden q))%Z = (QArith_base.Qnum q * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden p))%Z : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q -> Prop Argument scopes are [Q_scope Q_scope]
Ring_theory.Computational : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (reqb : R -> R -> bool), (forall x y : R, reqb x y = true -> req x y) -> Ring_theory.ring_kind
QArith_base.Qeq_bool_iff : forall x y : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qeq_bool x y = true < -> QArith_base.Qeq x y
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.add_mem_3 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem y s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem y (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x s) = true
N.divide = fun p q : N => exists r : N, q = (r * p)%N : N -> N -> Prop Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
N.gcd_unique : forall n m p : N, (0 <= p)%N -> (p | n)%N -> (p | m)%N -> (forall q : N, (q | n)%N -> (q | m)%N -> (q | p)%N) -> N.gcd n m = p
Z.gcd_unique : forall n m p : Z, (0 <= p)%Z -> (p | n)%Z -> (p | m)%Z -> (forall q : Z, (q | n)%Z -> (q | m)%Z -> (q | p)%Z) -> Z.gcd n m = p
Z.lcm_unique : forall n m p : Z, (0 <= p)%Z -> (n | p)%Z -> (m | p)%Z -> (forall q : Z, (n | q)%Z -> (m | q)%Z -> (p | q)%Z) -> Z.lcm n m = p
N.lcm_unique : forall n m p : N, (0 <= p)%N -> (n | p)%N -> (m | p)%N -> (forall q : N, (n | q)%N -> (m | q)%N -> (p | q)%N) -> N.lcm n m = p
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_imp_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) /\ (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) < -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q)
Fin.eqb = fix eqb (m n : nat) (p : Fin.t m) (q : Fin.t n) {struct p} : bool := match p with | @Fin.F1 m' => match q with | @Fin.F1 n' => m' =? n' | Fin.FS _ => false end | @Fin.FS n0 p' => match q with | Fin.F1 => false | @Fin.FS n1 q' => eqb n0 n1 p' q' end end : forall m n : nat, Fin.t m -> Fin.t n -> bool Arguments m, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope _ _]
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall A B : Prop, A < -> B -> A = B
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q
Zle_bool_trans : forall n m p : Z, (n <=? m)%Z = true -> (m <=? p)%Z = true -> (n <=? p)%Z = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_1 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, (forall x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = true
BinNatDef.N.gcd = fun a b : N => match a with | 0%N => b | N.pos p => match b with | 0%N => a | N.pos q => N.pos (Pos.gcd p q) end end : N -> N -> N Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_2 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = true -> forall x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> f x = true

```coq
intros eqb_eq x y H.
split.
- intros eqb_eq_true.
  induction x; induction y; simpl in *.
  + reflexivity.
  + discriminate.
  + discriminate.
  + discriminate.
  + discriminate.
  + apply andb_true_iff in eqb_eq_true.
    destruct eqb_eq_true as [eqb_eq_true1 eqb_eq_true2].
    apply (IHx1 y1) in eqb_eq_true1.
    apply (IHx2 y2) in eqb_eq_true2.
    congruence.
- intros.
  generalize dependent y.
  induction x; destruct y; simpl; intros; try discriminate.
  + reflexivity.
  + apply andb_true_iff.
    inversion H; subst.
    split.
    * apply (IHx1 y1); auto.
    * apply (IHx2 y2); auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros eqb_eq x y H. split. - intros eqb_eq_true. induction x; induction y; simpl in *. + reflexivity. + discriminate. + discriminate. + discriminate. + discriminate. + apply andb_true_iff in eqb_eq_true. destruct eqb_eq_true as [eqb_eq_true1 eqb_eq_true2]. apply (IHx1 y1) in eqb_eq_true1. apply (IHx2 y2) in eqb_eq_true2. congruence. - intros. generalize dependent y. induction x; destruct y; simpl; intros; try discriminate. + reflexivity. + apply andb_true_iff. inversion H; subst. split. * apply (IHx1 y1); auto. * apply (IHx2 y2); auto.
